title: Valaris Bankruptcy Deal Settles Fight Between Lenders and Bondholders
sub_head: Bankrupt offshore drilling contractor said Citigroup-led group will now have leeway to take more cash instead of stock
body:
Bankrupt offshore drilling contractor Valaris PLC signed a proposed restructuring deal to settle a fight between unsecured bondholders and bank lenders, which are now getting the option to be repaid more cash instead of stock.
Bank lenders had been complaining during the chapter 11 that junior creditors were getting too much say in the bankruptcy proceedings.
